metadata.title: CVE-2020-29509 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The encoding/xml package in Go (all versions) does not correctly preservethe semantics of attribute namespace prefixes during tokenizationround-trips, which allows an attacker to craft inputs that behave inconflicting ways during different stages of processing in affecteddownstream applications.

criterions.comment: golang-1.13 package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
golang-1.14 package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
